content: i love making round ripples for babies i m hoping many of you great crocheters will make a few baby blankets for some worthy charities and send me pictures of your completed items if you enjoy testing new patterns please visit my blog and become a follower and subscriber by email http //smoothfoxlover blogspot com http //smoothfoxlover blogspot com/2009/10/smoothfoxs-christmas-tree-skirt-free html donna smoothfoxlover@yahoo com
